column3: I  do  not  agree  with  this  submission.  The  learned  Magistrate  has

column2: recorded in the journal entry dated that the Respondent is not proceedingfor
proceeding  at  all.  The  Respondent  has  come  to  know  that  there  is  a  case
pending  before  the  Court  of Appeal  and  brought  it  to  the  notice  of the
Magistrate Court. It is obvious that his intention was not to proceed with the

column1: case  only  until  he  obtains  a  copy of the proceeding in the  Court of Appeal

column2: because  he  has  tendered  the  said  copy to  the  Magistrate  Court on the  very
